info.title: Posthoot API
info.description: Comprehensive API server for Posthoot email marketing platform

400.description: Validation error or team not found
Validation error or campaign not found
Validation error or email not found
Validation error or team not found
Validation error or team not found

post.description: Upload a file to the server

400.description: Validation error or file not found

post.description: Create a new tracking entry with device and location info

400.description: Validation error or email not found

get.description: Authenticate user using Google OAuth ID token

400.description: Failed to parse user data from Google

401.description: Failed to get user data from Google

post.summary: Invite a user to join a team
post.description: Send an invitation email to a user to join a team
Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Get details of the current authenticated user

post.description: Request a password reset code to be sent via email

200.description: Reset code sent if email exists

post.summary: Verify reset code and set new password
post.description: Verify password reset code and update password
Get a new access token using a valid refresh token
Register a new user with email, password and name details

get.description: Get a list of all users (requires admin permissions)
Get details of a specific user (requires admin permissions)

put.description: Update details of a specific user (requires admin permissions)

delete.description: Delete a specific user (requires admin permissions)

post.description: Send an email using the provided template and variables

get.description: Get the current subscription for the team

post.description: Create a pending subscription and redirect to payment

get.description: Get list of features enabled for the team's subscription
Generate a URL for managing subscription settings

post.description: Process subscription status updates from Dodo Payments

BearerAuth.description: Enter the token with the `Bearer: ` prefix, e.g. "Bearer abcde12345".

averageReadTime.description: Average time between open and click

repeatClicks.description: Number of times same user clicked

internal_handlers.InviteUserRequest.description: Send an invitation email to a user to join a team

limit.description: Optional limit for the feature (e.g., number of campaigns)

scope.description: Scope defines the permission level, e.g. "read:campaigns", "write:templates"
